## Description

Please describe your changes.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Community overlay (new or updated community implementation)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)

## Sensitivity Check

For community content changes:
- [ ] I have consulted with community members or scholars
- [ ] The content respects the sacred nature of death rituals
- [ ] Language is warm and dignified (not clinical)
- [ ] No real personal data is included

## Invariant Check

For code changes:
- [ ] I have run `npm run test:invariants` and all tests pass
- [ ] My changes do not weaken any existing invariant
- [ ] My changes do not bypass plane isolation

## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)
- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines
- [ ] I have added tests (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated documentation (if applicable)
